name: Aura of Souls
flavor: A whirlwind of souls of the dead flies around you at your command.

metadata.flavor: A whirlwind of souls of the dead flies around you at your command.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, at the end of each of your turns, you can slide each creature in the area up to a number of squares equal to your Intuition score. This forced movement ignores stability for your allies.
